root.name: Bio FREAKS
root.description: OverviewIt's mutilation time!This polygonal fighting game was originally designed for release in arcades, but it never made it past the location test stage in coin-op form. Instead, Midway chose to finish the game and release it for home platforms in 1998. The game, apart from standard ground based moves features a wide variety of aerial moves and mutilations which can instantly sever opponents arms, decapitate or cut in half. What is interesting is that the opponents will keep fighting even if their arms lay on the floor in gallons of blood.Playable charactersBullzeyeBullzeyeDeltaMinatekPsyclownPurgeSabotageSsapoZipperheadBossesClonusMutilator
